name: Royal Aero Club of Western Australia
about: The Royal Aero Club of Western Australia (RACWA) is one of Australia's largest and most esteemed flying training organisations, with a rich history dating back to 1929. Located at Jandakot Airport in Perth, RACWA boasts multi-million dollar facilities and a diverse fleet of aircraft. The club is staffed by 30 qualified flight instructors and pilots, ensuring high standards of safety and proficiency. RACWA offers a range of training programs, including Private Pilot Licences, Commercial Pilot Licences, instrument ratings, and instructor ratings, all delivered through a partnership with the Western Australian Aviation College. Known for its friendly and relaxed environment, RACWA provides personal attention to its members while offering access to top-notch facilities and comprehensive training options. Whether you aspire to fly for recreation or as a career, RACWA is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
